#include &lt;climits&gt;
#include &lt;numeric&gt;
 
static_assert
(""
    &amp;&amp; (std::sub_sat&lt;int&gt;(INT_MIN + 4, 3) == INT_MIN + 1) // 未饱和
    &amp;&amp; (std::sub_sat&lt;int&gt;(INT_MIN + 4, 5) == INT_MIN) // 饱和
    &amp;&amp; (std::sub_sat&lt;int&gt;(INT_MAX - 4, -3) == INT_MAX - 1) // 未饱和
    &amp;&amp; (std::sub_sat&lt;int&gt;(INT_MAX - 4, -5) == INT_MAX) // 饱和
    &amp;&amp; (std::sub_sat&lt;unsigned&gt;(4, 3) == 1) // 未饱和
    &amp;&amp; (std::sub_sat&lt;unsigned&gt;(4, 5) == 0) // 饱和
);

int main() {}
}}
